title: Hurricane Category 3 - Gulf of Mexico
description: Major hurricane approaching. Expected landfall Oct 24. All Gulf shipping lanes at risk.
recommended_action: Delay departures or reroute via Atlantic routes

title: Severe Port Congestion - Shanghai
description: Port operations at 150% capacity. Average delay: 5-7 days for all vessels.
recommended_action: Consider rerouting to Ningbo or Qingdao ports

title: Suez Canal Disruption Concerns
description: Escalating tensions may affect canal transit. Monitor situation closely.
recommended_action: Prepare contingency routes via Cape of Good Hope
